meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was the obscenest film I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: That painting is the obscenest artwork in the entire gallery.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked was so obscenest that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The storm outside was the obscenest display of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's reaction to the student's prank was the obscenest thing I've witnessed in class.

meanings.sent1: His joke at the party was the obscenest comment I've heard all night.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti on the wall is the obscenest display of disrespect.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to steal the dog's food was the obscenest act of rebellion.
meanings.sent4: The politician's behavior was the obscenest betrayal of public trust.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the garbage can was the obscenest odor imaginable.
